author: yiiyama
body:
This pull request goes on top of #1834 and edits a file newly introduced there
(RecoEgamma/Configuration/python/customizeOldEGReco.py)

Additionally the DQM modules were modified to take edm::Viewreco::CaloCluster instead of reco::BasicClusterCollection to be compatible with PFClusters.
title: Enabling ECAL DQM to run on GED clusters
